```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(maps)
library(ggridges)
library(viridis)
library(patchwork)
library(showtext)

font_add_google("Saira")
font_add_google("Fira Sans Condensed")
font_add_google("Jost")

showtext_opts(dpi = 320)
showtext_auto(enable = TRUE)
```

```{r}
volcano <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-05-12/volcano.csv')

```

```{r}
regions <- volcano %>% 
  select(volcano_number, country, region, subregion, latitude, longitude ) %>%
  add_count(subregion, name = "occurrences") %>% 
  arrange(-occurrences) 

df_map <- map_data("world") %>% 
  as_tibble()
```


```{r}
plot_world <- df_map %>% 
  ggplot(aes(long, lat)) +
  geom_map(map = df_map, 
           aes(map_id = region), 
           fill = "#dfd3b9") +
  geom_point(data = regions,
             aes(longitude, latitude,
                 alpha = occurrences,
                 size = occurrences),
             color = "#d94f70") +
  labs(title = "World Volcanos by Number of Occurrences",
       caption = "Source: Smithsonian Institute | Graphic: Sung Inkyung") +
  scale_alpha(range = c(.5, .1),
              guide = "none") +
  scale_size(range = c(1, 5)) +
  guides(size = guide_legend(title = "",
                              title.position = "bottom",
                              title.hjust = .5,
                              title.vjust = .5)) +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = c(.55, .075),
        legend.direction = "horizontal",
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#8ac5d2",
                                        color = NA),
        plot.title = element_markdown(size = 16,
                                      family = "Saira",
                                      margin = margin(b = 7)),
        plot.caption = element_text(size = 7,
                                    family = "Saira",
                                    color = "#9389a3"))
```


```{r}
ini_vol <- volcano %>% 
  filter(country == "Indonesia") %>% 
  filter(!subregion %in% c("Krakatau", "Banda Sea"))

p1 <- ggplot() +
  geom_density_ridges_gradient(data = ini_vol,
                               aes(x = elevation,
                                   y = subregion,
                                   fill = stat(x))) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "magma",
                       alpha = .7,
                       direction = 1) +
  scale_x_continuous(expand = c(0, 0)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        panel.grid = element_blank(),
        axis.title.y = element_blank(),
        axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10,
                                  family = "Jost"))
```

```{r}
map_ini <- map_data("world", region = "Indonesia")

p2 <- ggplot() +
  geom_polygon(data = map_ini,
               aes(long, lat,
                   group = group),
               fill = "#bdaf90",
               alpha = .65) +
  geom_point(data = ini_vol,
             aes(longitude, latitude,
                 color = elevation)) +
  scale_color_viridis_c(option = "magma",
                        direction = 1) +
  guides(color = guide_colorbar(barheight = .5, 
                               barwidth = 9,
                               direction = "horizontal",
                               title = "Elevation",
                               ticks.colour = "grey20",
                               title.position = "top",
                               label.position = "top",
                               title.hjust = 0.5)) +
  labs(x = "longitude",
       y = "latitude") +
  annotate("text",
           x = 101.2,
           y = -2.5,
           label = "Sumatra",
           family = "Jost") +
  annotate("text",
           x = 123,
           y = -9,
           label = "Lesser Sunda Islands",
           family = "Jost") +
  annotate("text",
           x = 113,
           y = -8.1,
           label = "Java",
           family = "Jost") +
  annotate("text",
           x = 127.4,
           y = 0.65,
           label = "Halmahera",
           family = "Jost") +
  annotate("text",
           x = 130,
           y = -6.7,
           label = "Banda Sea",
           family = "Jost") +
  annotate("text",
           x = 105.4,
           y = -7,
           label = "Karakatau") +
  theme_void()+
  theme(legend.position = c(-.5, 0.1),
        legend.justification = c("left", "bottom"),
        legend.title = element_text(size = 8),
        legend.text = element_text(size = 7))
p2
```

```{r}
ini_vol %>% 
  group_by(subregion) %>% 
  slice_max(n = 7, order_by = elevation)

ini_vol %>% 
  count(last_eruption_year, sort = T) %>% 
  arrange(last_eruption_year)
```

```{r}
layout <- c(area(.5, .5, 5, 5),
            area(3, 3, 15, 15))
```


```{r}
p1 + p2 +
  plot_layout(design = layout) +
  plot_annotation(
    title = "Volcanoes in Indonesia",
    subtitle = "Elevations of 95 volcanoes acorss 7 subregions in Indonesia\nEach subregion is marked with the highest elevation",
    caption = "Source: Smithsonian | Graphic: Sung Inkyung"
  ) &
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 20,
                                  family = "Saira",
                                  margin = margin(b = 7)),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 11,
                                     lineheight = 0.9,
                                     family = "Fira Sans Condensed",
                                     margin = margin(b = 15)),
        plot.caption = element_text(size = 7,
                                    family = "Fira Sans Condensed"),
        plot.margin = margin(10, 10, 10, 10))

ggsave("volcanoeEruptions_Indonesia.png", width = 21, height = 13, units = "cm")
```
